entry.title: Rangers vs Celtic as it happened: Youth Cup final sealed
entry.summary: Rangers and Celtic's first team locked horns for the fifth time this season at the national stadium on Sunday. Now, it's the turn of the clubs' young guns to take centre stage at Hampden as they fight it out to become Scottish Youth Cup winners. The game will have extra time and penalties if the youngsters cannot be separated after 90 minutes.
